news_insight_text_link.news_insight_description: A former executive of ARC Clean Energy has suggested that N.B. Power should explore additional options for small modular nuclear reactors beyond the two companies currently being considered.

org_similarity_summary.insight_similar_orgs: ARC Clean Energy, Brillouin Energy, Aquion Energy, Wildcat Discovery Technologies, Singularity Energy, and Electric Hydrogen are all involved in the clean energy and renewable technology sector. Brillouin Energy, Aquion Energy, and Wildcat Discovery Technologies focus on developing renewable energy technologies and energy storage systems. Singularity Energy uses carbon data for energy decisions, while Electric Hydrogen develops electrolyzer technologies for clean hydrogen production.

overview_description.description: ARC Clean Energy is a clean energy technology company offering carbon-free power.  Leveraging technology from the 30-year performance of its prototype, the ARC-100’s simple, modular design provides 100 megawatts of electricity and industrial heat that are cost-competitive with fossil fuels.

properties.growth_insight_description: ARC Clean Energy may be growing as it has established a collaboration with Canada's Building Trades Unions to develop a skilled workforce for Small Modular Reactors (SMRs), indicating an expansion of operations and investment in human resources. This partnership suggests that ARC Clean Energy is actively working on projects that require specialized labor, which could be a sign of ongoing or upcoming projects in the clean energy sector. The collaboration with a major union also implies a strategic move to ensure that the company has the necessary workforce to meet its operational goals, reflecting a proactive approach to growth in the clean energy industry.

about_short_description.short_description: ARC Clean Energy is a clean energy technology company offering carbon-free power.

product.name: ARC-100
product.description: An advanced small modular reactor (SMR) designed for inherently safe, reliable, and economical carbon-free power generation and waste management.

product.name: Supply Chain Development
product.description: Initiatives to establish a sustainable supply chain for the economic growth and job creation in New Brunswick and Canada, focusing on the advanced SMR technology field.

product.name: Vendor Design Review Phase 2
product.description: A phase in the regulatory process with the Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission (CNSC) to ensure ARC-100 technology aligns with Canada's safety regulations.

identifier.value: Partnership with Cross River Infrastructure Partners LLC

product.name: Partnership with Cross River Infrastructure Partners LLC
product.description: A collaboration to develop sustainable industrial projects globally using ARC's advanced SMR technology for carbon-free power and heat.

product.name: SMR Supply Chain Event
product.description: An event focused on engaging suppliers from Atlantic Canada in the advanced SMR opportunity, facilitating participation in the supply chain.
